meanings.definition: The quality or state of being undesirable.
meanings.sent1: The undesirableness of the situation made everyone unhappy.
meanings.sent2: The job's undesirableness led to many employees seeking new opportunities.
meanings.sent3: Despite its undesirableness, the old couch became the favorite napping spot for the cat.
meanings.sent4: The undesirableness of the weather was like a dark cloud hanging over the picnic.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's strict rules highlighted the undesirableness of tardiness.

meanings.definition: The condition of not being wanted or preferred.
meanings.sent1: The undesirableness of the outdated technology was evident to all.
meanings.sent2: She felt the undesirableness of being left out of the group.
meanings.sent3: The cat's undisputed king of the house status added to the undesirableness of the new puppy.
meanings.sent4: The undesirableness of the situation was a bitter pill to swallow.
meanings.sent5: The undesirableness of the taste lingered long after the meal was over.
